ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableCardIc: Enable/disable clickable card icons in Sidebar Card Stacks
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDispla: Enable/disable displaying cards when they are dealt.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableWhispe: Enable whisper card details to DM
Enable/disable whispering card details to the DM on view.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.defaultCardB: Configure the default border width on displayed cards.
Configure the default border color on displayed cards.
Configure the default card back image on images viewed as cards.

ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.deckNotF: No deck by that name was found.

ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.cardNotF: No card by that ID or name was found.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.pileNotF: No pile found by the name "{pileName}". Creating a new discard pile by that name.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.ui.ignoreWordsInDeckN: the, thy, a, an, in, on, of, for, de, le, la, el, los, las, deck, cards, card
